sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Cisco Systems topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 4.0%.
Year to date, Cisco Systems registers a 20.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike, trading down 2.2%.
Nike is showing a gain of 17.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot, trading down 2.0%, and JPMorgan Chase, trading up 0.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
